name: experiment
label: Experiment
help: Historical refers to the climate projection experiments for the past. RCP/SSP refers to the various emission scenarios for the future projections. More details on the scenarios are available in the CMIP5, CMIP6 and CORDEX documentation pages.  None refers to the observation/reanalysis datasets, where experiments are not relevant.

name: domain
label: Domain
help: CMIP5, CMIP6, ERA5, ERA5-Land and ORAS5 data are available on global domain. CORDEX-CORE is a global mosaic, which means that a global dataset is created over continental regions from regional climate model simulations over various CORDEX domains. E-OBS gridded observations are available over Europe and CORDEX-EUR-11 for the EURO-CORDEX domain.

name: period
label: Period
help: The period is determined by the data origin and the experiment, however it is displayed here to allow the users to understand that this dataset provides timeseries. Note that although the period is the maximum temporal extent of each dataset some models don't cover the entire temporal range, i.e. there might be some gaps.
